text: "Not a Criminal" is a 2007 song by American rapper Chamillionaire and American singer and songwriter Kelis. It was going to be a lead single on Chamillionaire's second studio album Ultimate Victory, but it was replaced by "Hip Hop Police". The song has another version called "Not a Criminal Part II", it is made by American rappers Busta Rhymes and Snoop Dogg. "Not a Criminal" was at number three on the Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles chart. In 2018, the song was released on Chamillionaire's album Greatest Verses 3. ==Charts== Chart (2007) Peak Position U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 3 U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles 5 U.S. Billboard Hot Rap Tracks 21 == References == Category:2007 songs Category:Chamillionaire songs Category:Songs written by Chamillionaire Category:Snoop Dogg songs
title: Not a Criminal
